data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tsai, Jing-Fu, Rédei, Dávid (2017): The genus Arocatus in Taiwan (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Lygaeidae).
